articles.title: Ab de Villiers Slams Litton Das For Calling Ish Sodhi Back In Run-Out Saga - OneCricket
articles.description: Former South African captain and batting great AB de Villiers echoes Tamim Iqbal, criticises Litton Das for his decision to recall New Zealand all-rounder Ish Sodhi despite a clean runout.
articles.content:
Litton Das speaks with Ish Sodhi (x.com)
Bangladesh captain Litton Das recalled New Zealand all-rounder Ish Sodhi after the latter was found short of his crease at the non-strikers end. The incident… [+1997 chars]
